name: Miragem (littlegiants)
description: Miragem is a 3D platform game, inspired by the old classics of the industry, which tells the story of Ma and At, two opposing beings who wake up on a mysterious island with no memories of how they arrived. Inexplicably At is trapped inside Ma’s body and now they need to find a way to separate themself. The player will be able to alternate between personalities in controlling the body, changing the characters' abilities, the way they interact with the scene and especially how they see the world, allowing phases that combine exploration, observation and mechanics that allow more than one challenges.
